descriptions: Responsible for feeding, operating, and monitoring the production line, ensuring product quality and compliance. I perform basic equipment maintenance and troubleshooting. I also operate forklifts as part of my daily duties.
Operated specialized industrial equipment in a construction environment. Worked in an international context that required communication in various languages, adapting to different work cultures.
Performed specialized tasks in the production of concrete railway sleepers, including demolding, mold equipment preparation, and operation of specific production line machinery.
Responsible for feeding, regulating, and maintaining glazing machines in good working order. Collected products from glazing lines and performed pottery loading and unloading processes.

Provided personalized service and technical advice, collaborated in store organization, product sales, stock replenishment, and signage application. Developed advanced communication skills and knowledge of technological products available in the market.
